title: Valance, 1900–50
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidey using wool in satin, herringbone, back, chain, running, buttonhole, feather, bouillon knot, french knot and other stitches on 2\2 twill linen foundation.
description: Man in eighteenth century costume blowing a hunting horn following three dogs chasing a deer. At the right are a seated woman with a shepherdess crook, three sheep and a house. There are tree trunks with exotic blossoms.
